verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician <S%H5329><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> Maschil. <S%H4905><s%> We have heard <S%H8085><s%> with our ears, <S%H241><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> our fathers <S%H1><s%> have told <S%H5608><s%> us, what work <S%H6467><s%> you did <S%H6466><s%> in their days, <S%H3117><s%> in the times <S%H3117><s%> of old. <S%H6924><s%>

How you did drive <S%H3423><s%> out the heathen <S%H1471><s%> with your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and planted <S%H5193><s%> them; how you did afflict <S%H7489><s%> the people, <S%H3816><s%> and cast <S%H7971><s%> them out.

For they got <S%H3423><s%> not the land <S%H776><s%> in possession <S%H3423><s%> by their own sword, <S%H2719><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did their own arm <S%H2220><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> them: but your right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> and your arm, <S%H2220><s%> and the light <S%H216><s%> of your countenance, <S%H6440><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> you had a favor <S%H7522><s%> to them.
You are my King, <S%H4428><s%> O God: <S%H430><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> deliverances <S%H3444><s%> for Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
Through you will we push <S%H5055><s%> down our enemies: <S%H6862><s%> through your name <S%H8034><s%> will we tread <S%H947><s%> them under that rise <S%H6965><s%> up against us.
For I will not trust <S%H982><s%> in my bow, <S%H7198><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall my sword <S%H2719><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> me.
But you have saved <S%H3467><s%> us from our enemies, <S%H6862><s%> and have put them to shame <S%H954><s%> that hated <S%H8130><s%> us.
In God <S%H430><s%> we boast <S%H1984><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> long, and praise <S%H3034><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> for ever. <S%H5769><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
But you have cast <S%H2186><s%> off, and put us to shame; <S%H3637><s%> and go <S%H3318><s%> not forth <S%H3318><s%> with our armies. <S%H6635><s%>
You make us to turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H268><s%> from the enemy: <S%H6862><s%> and they which hate <S%H8130><s%> us spoil <S%H8154><s%> for themselves.
You have given <S%H5414><s%> us like sheep <S%H6629><s%> appointed for meat; <S%H3978><s%> and have scattered <S%H2219><s%> us among the heathen. <S%H1471><s%>
You sell <S%H4376><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> for nothing, <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1952><s%> and do not increase <S%H7235><s%> your wealth by their price. <S%H4242><s%>
You make <S%H6213><s%> us a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to our neighbors, <S%H7934><s%> a scorn <S%H3933><s%> and a derision <S%H7047><s%> to them that are round <S%H5439><s%> about us.
You make <S%H6213><s%> us a byword <S%H4912><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> a shaking <S%H4493><s%> of the head <S%H7218><s%> among the people. <S%H3816><s%>
My confusion <S%H3639><s%> is continually <S%H3117><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> me, and the shame <S%H1322><s%> of my face <S%H6440><s%> has covered <S%H3680><s%> me,
For the voice <S%H6963><s%> of him that reproaches <S%H2778><s%> and blasphemes; <S%H1442><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%> and avenger. <S%H5358><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> on us; yet have we not forgotten <S%H7911><s%> you, neither <S%H3808><s%> have we dealt falsely <S%H8266><s%> in your covenant. <S%H1285><s%>
Our heart <S%H3820><s%> is not turned <S%H5472><s%> back, <S%H268><s%> neither have our steps <S%H838><s%> declined <S%H5186><s%> from your way; <S%H734><s%>
Though <S%H3588><s%> you have sore broken <S%H1794><s%> us in the place <S%H4725><s%> of dragons, <S%H8577><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> us with the shadow <S%H6757><s%> of death. <S%H6757><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> we have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of our God, <S%H430><s%> or stretched <S%H6566><s%> out our hands <S%H3709><s%> to a strange <S%H2114><s%> god; <S%H410><s%>
Shall not God <S%H430><s%> search <S%H2713><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> out? for he knows <S%H3045><s%> the secrets <S%H8587><s%> of the heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Yes, <S%H3588><s%> for your sake are we killed <S%H2026><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> long; we are counted <S%H2803><s%> as sheep <S%H6629><s%> for the slaughter. <S%H2878><s%>
Awake, <S%H5782><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> sleep <S%H3462><s%> you, O Lord? <S%H136><s%> arise, <S%H6974><s%> cast <S%H2186><s%> us not off for ever. <S%H5331><s%>
Why <S%H4100><s%> hide <S%H5641><s%> you your face, <S%H6440><s%> and forget <S%H7911><s%> our affliction <S%H6040><s%> and our oppression? <S%H3906><s%>
For our soul <S%H5315><s%> is bowed <S%H7743><s%> down <S%H7743><s%> to the dust: <S%H6083><s%> our belly <S%H990><s%> sticks <S%H1692><s%> to the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Arise <S%H6965><s%> for our help, <S%H5833><s%> and redeem <S%H6299><s%> us for your mercies' <S%H2617><s%> sake. <S%H4616><s%>
